Other Information.Additional Info: Preferred adsorption sites observed with multiple host-guest hydrogen bonding interactions.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size exclusion due to pore size mismatch

Other Information.Additional Info: No structural transformation or significant adsorption observed under C3F8 atmosphere.

Sieving Mechanism: Temperature-modulated gating mechanism enabling molecular sieving of C3F6/C3F8 mixtures

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, IAST calculation, PXRD analysis
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C3F6/C3F8 selectivity: >10⁴ at 298 K, C3F6 uptake: 2.0 mmol g⁻¹ at 298 K and 100 kPa

Other Information.Additional Info: Dynamic breakthrough experiments confirm complete separation of C3F6/C3F8 mixtures under ambient conditions.
